package.name: sidebar_category_listing
package.summary: Extension that display categories in sidebar
package.description:
Do you want to customize the gaze of your shop to be more appealing? Are you bored to see the category listing in the header part of your Magneto store? If yes then consider using Sidebar Category Listing which let you customize the sidebar in different ways.
It’s a free extension which will save time, extra effort of developer and thus cost for integrating this feature.
Main features of this extension: 1. East to install 2. Open source and free code 3. Show categories listing in the sidebar 4. Change the label color/text and category listing color from the admin panel. 5. Easily customizable 6. Turn On or Off from the backend itself 7. Change position sidebar position. 8. 24/7 Support 9. Free updates from time to time
